command.text: SELECT schvchdlydetailreg.Trs_No, schvchdlydetailreg.schvchdlyhdregid, schvchdlyhdreg.ReferanceNo AS schvchdlyhdregReferanceNo, schvchdlyhdregIDregorg.NAME_1 AS schvchdlyhdregIDregorgNAME_1, schvchdlyhdregbranch.Desc1 AS schvchdlyhdregbranchDesc1, schvchdlyhdregbranchGender.Gender AS schvchdlyhdregbranchGenderGender, schvchdlyhdregbranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS schvchdlyhdregbranchschtypschtypDesc, schvchdlydetailreg.branch, Thebranch.Desc1 AS ThebranchDesc1, Thebranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS Thebranchsgmsgm_Nm, ThebranchGender.Gender AS ThebranchGenderGender, Thebranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS ThebranchschtypschtypDesc, schvchdlydetailreg.acdcode, acd.AcademicYear AS acdAcademicYear, acdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, schvchdlydetailreg.StudentCode, Student.SchstCivilidnumber AS StudentSchstCivilidnumber, Studentarea.Desc1 AS StudentareaDesc1, Studentbranch.Desc1 AS StudentbranchDesc1, Studentbranchopco.OpcoName AS StudentbranchopcoOpcoName, StudentbranchGender.Gender AS StudentbranchGenderGender, Studentbranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS StudentbranchschtypschtypDesc, StudentCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentGender.Gender AS StudentGenderGender, StudentReligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentReligionReljan_nm, Studentstate.State_Nm AS StudentstateState_Nm, Studentid.name_1 AS Studentidname_1, Studentacd.AcademicYear AS StudentacdAcademicYear, StudentacdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS StudentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, StudentApplicationCodeauto.civilidst AS StudentApplicationCodeautocivilidst, StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No2.Cntry_Nm AS StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No2Cntry_Nm, StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No1.Cntry_Nm AS StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No1Cntry_Nm, StudentApplicationCodeautoGender.Gender AS StudentApplicationCodeautoGenderGender, StudentApplicationCodeautostate.State_Nm AS StudentApplicationCodeautostateState_Nm, StudentApplicationCodeautoid.name_1 AS StudentApplicationCodeautoidname_1, StudentApplicationCodeautoAcademicYearto.AcademicYear AS StudentApplicationCodeautoAcademicYeartoAcademicYear, StudentApplicationCodeautoarea.Desc1 AS StudentApplicationCodeautoareaDesc1, StudentApplicationCodeautobranch.Desc1 AS StudentApplicationCodeautobranchDesc1, StudentApplicationCodeautoClass.ClassDesc1 AS StudentApplicationCodeautoClassClassDesc1, StudentApplicationCodeautoSchclasskind.Schclasskinddesc AS StudentApplicationCodeautoSchclasskindSchclasskinddesc, StudentApplicationCodeautofathercase.job_desc AS StudentApplicationCodeautofathercasejob_desc, StudentApplicationCodeautoGradeApplied.ShortDesc1 AS StudentApplicationCodeautoGradeAppliedShortDesc1, StudentApplicationCodeautomothercase.job_desc AS StudentApplicationCodeautomothercasejob_desc, StudentApplicationCodeautosocialstatus.schsocialstatuscaseDesc AS StudentApplicationCodeautosocialstatusschsocialstatuscaseDesc, StudentApplicationCodeautoStageAppliedto.ShortDesc1 AS StudentApplicationCodeautoStageAppliedtoShortDesc1, StudentApplicationCodeautoschstatus_.schstatus_name AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschstatus_schstatus_name, StudentApplicationCodeautoschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgDesc AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschstclasskinddmgschstclasskinddmgDesc, StudentApplicationCodeautoschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseDesc AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschsthlthcaseschsthlthcaseDesc, StudentApplicationCodeautostudentsefa.studentsefaar AS StudentApplicationCodeautostudentsefastudentsefaar, StudentApplicationCodeautoschstudenttyp.schstudenttyp AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschstudenttypschstudenttyp, StudentApplicationCodeautoSchtransfer.SchtransferDesc AS StudentApplicationCodeautoSchtransferSchtransferDesc, StudentApplicationCodeautoschtrns.schtrnsDesc AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschtrnsschtrnsDesc, StudentClass.ClassDesc1 AS StudentClassClassDesc1, StudentSchclasskind.Schclasskinddesc AS StudentSchclasskindSchclasskinddesc, StudentFather.fathfirstname1 AS StudentFatherfathfirstname1, StudentFatherMaritalStatus.Status_Nm AS StudentFatherMaritalStatusStatus_Nm, StudentFatherarea.Desc1 AS StudentFatherareaDesc1, StudentFatherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentFatherCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentFatherreligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentFatherreligionReljan_nm, StudentFatherState.State_Nm AS StudentFatherStateState_Nm, StudentFatherjob_.job_desc AS StudentFatherjob_job_desc, StudentGrade.ShortDesc1 AS StudentGradeShortDesc1, StudentGradeacd.AcademicYear AS StudentGradeacdAcademicYear, StudentGradeStage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentGradeStageShortDesc1, StudentMother.firstname1 AS StudentMotherfirstname1, StudentMotherarea.Desc1 AS StudentMotherareaDesc1, StudentMotherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentMotherCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentMotherreligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentMotherreligionReljan_nm, StudentMotherState.State_Nm AS StudentMotherStateState_Nm, StudentMotherjob_.job_desc AS StudentMotherjob_job_desc, StudentStage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentStageShortDesc1, Studentschstatus_.schstatus_name AS Studentschstatus_schstatus_name, Studentschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgDesc AS StudentschstclasskinddmgschstclasskinddmgDesc, Studentschstspl.schstsplDsc AS StudentschstsplschstsplDsc, Studentschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseDesc AS StudentschsthlthcaseschsthlthcaseDesc, Studentstudentsefa.studentsefaar AS Studentstudentsefastudentsefaar, Studentstudentsefadebitaccount.Acc_Nm AS StudentstudentsefadebitaccountAcc_Nm, Studentschstudenttyp.schstudenttyp AS Studentschstudenttypschstudenttyp, StudentSchtransfer.SchtransferDesc AS StudentSchtransferSchtransferDesc, schvchdlydetailreg.FatherCode, Father.fathfirstname1 AS Fatherfathfirstname1, FatherMaritalStatus.Status_Nm AS FatherMaritalStatusStatus_Nm, Fatherarea.Desc1 AS FatherareaDesc1, FatherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS FatherCntry_Cntry_Nm, Fatherreligion.Reljan_nm AS FatherreligionReljan_nm, FatherState.State_Nm AS FatherStateState_Nm, Fatherjob_.job_desc AS Fatherjob_job_desc, schvchdlydetailreg.Trsd_Dt, schvchdlydetailreg.schpaymenttypeid, schpaymenttype.schpaymenttypenm AS schpaymenttypeschpaymenttypenm, schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Nm, schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_Acc_Nm, schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_BndAcc_Nm, schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Nm, schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_Acc_Nm, schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_BndAcc_Nm, schvchdlydetailreg.Mony_Paid, schvchdlydetailreg.Notes, schvchdlydetailreg.StudentCode AS StudentCode1, schvchdlydetailreg.StudentCode AS StudentCode2, schvchdlyhdreg.Trs_Dt, schvchdlyhdreg.Balance, Student.FirstName1, Student.schstEmail FROM dbo.glmulcmp AS Thebranchsgm LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OpCo AS Studentbranchopco ON Thebranchsgm.OpcoID = Studentbranchopco.OpcoIDidentity RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS schvchdlyhdregbranch ON Thebranchsgm.sgmid = schvchdlyhdregbranch.sgm RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.schvchdlydetailreg AS schvchdlydetailreg LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schvchdlyhdreg AS schvchdlyhdreg ON schvchdlydetailreg.schvchdlyhdregid = schvchdlyhdreg.schvchdlyhdregid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.REG_ORGANIZATIONS AS schvchdlyhdregIDregorg ON schvchdlyhdreg.IDregorg = schvchdlyhdregIDregorg.IDIDregorg ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.branch = schvchdlyhdreg.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS schvchdlyhdregbranchGender ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.Genderid = schvchdlyhdregbranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS schvchdlyhdregbranchschtyp ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.schtypid = schvchdlyhdregbranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Thebranch ON schvchdlydetailreg.branch = Thebranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS ThebranchGender ON Thebranch.Genderid = ThebranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Thebranchschtyp ON Thebranch.schtypid = Thebranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS acd ON schvchdlydetailreg.acdcode = acd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS acdGlFinperiod ON acd.GlFinperiodID = acdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchStudent AS Student ON schvchdlydetailreg.StudentCode = Student.StudentCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS Studentarea ON Student.area = Studentarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Studentbranch ON Student.branch = Studentbranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentbranchGender ON Studentbranch.Genderid = StudentbranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Studentbranchschtyp ON Studentbranch.schtypid = Studentbranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentCntry_ ON Student.Cntry_No = StudentCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentGender ON Student.Genderid = StudentGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentReligion ON Student.Religion = StudentReligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS Studentstate ON Student.state = Studentstate.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.reg_other_schools AS Studentid ON Student.id = Studentid.id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS Studentacd ON Student.acdcode = Studentacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS StudentacdGlFinperiod ON Studentacd.GlFinperiodID = StudentacdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schApplication AS StudentApplicationCodeauto ON Student.ApplicationCodeauto = StudentApplicationCodeauto.ApplicationCodeauto LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_ ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Cntry_No = StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No2 ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Cntry_No2 = StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No2.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No1 ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Cntry_No1 = StudentApplicationCodeautoCntry_No1.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentApplicationCodeautoGender ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Genderid = StudentApplicationCodeautoGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentApplicationCodeautostate ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.state = StudentApplicationCodeautostate.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.reg_other_schools AS StudentApplicationCodeautoid ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.id = StudentApplicationCodeautoid.id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS StudentApplicationCodeautoAcademicYearto ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.AcademicYearto = StudentApplicationCodeautoAcademicYearto.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentApplicationCodeautoarea ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.area = StudentApplicationCodeautoarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS StudentApplicationCodeautobranch ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.branch = StudentApplicationCodeautobranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schClassConfig AS StudentApplicationCodeautoClass ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Class = StudentApplicationCodeautoClass.classcode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schclasskindlist AS StudentApplicationCodeautoSchclasskind ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Schclasskindid = StudentApplicationCodeautoSchclasskind.Schclasskindid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchFatherjob AS StudentApplicationCodeautofathercase ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.fathercase = StudentApplicationCodeautofathercase.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schGrade AS StudentApplicationCodeautoGradeApplied ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.GradeApplied = StudentApplicationCodeautoGradeApplied.GradeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchMotherjob AS StudentApplicationCodeautomothercase ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.mothercase = StudentApplicationCodeautomothercase.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schsocialstatuscase AS StudentApplicationCodeautosocialstatus ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.socialstatus = StudentApplicationCodeautosocialstatus.schsocialstatuscaseid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentApplicationCodeautoStageAppliedto ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.StageAppliedto = StudentApplicationCodeautoStageAppliedto.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstatus AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschstatus_ ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.schstatus_code = StudentApplicationCodeautoschstatus_.schstatus_code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstclasskinddmg AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschstclasskinddmg ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.schstclasskinddmgid = StudentApplicationCodeautoschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schsthealthcase AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschsthlthcase ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.schsthlthcaseid = StudentApplicationCodeautoschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schstudentsefa AS StudentApplicationCodeautostudentsefa ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.studentsefa = StudentApplicationCodeautostudentsefa.studentsefaid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstudenttyp AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschstudenttyp ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.schstudenttypid = StudentApplicationCodeautoschstudenttyp.schstudenttypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schtransferlist AS StudentApplicationCodeautoSchtransfer ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.Schtransferid = StudentApplicationCodeautoSchtransfer.Schtransferid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtrnstype AS StudentApplicationCodeautoschtrns ON StudentApplicationCodeauto.schtrnsid = StudentApplicationCodeautoschtrns.schtrnsid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schClassConfig AS StudentClass ON Student.Class = StudentClass.classcode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schclasskindlist AS StudentSchclasskind ON Student.Schclasskindid = StudentSchclasskind.Schclasskindid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schFather AS StudentFather ON Student.FatherCode = StudentFather.FatherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyStatus AS StudentFatherMaritalStatus ON StudentFather.MaritalStatus = StudentFatherMaritalStatus.Status_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentFatherarea ON StudentFather.area = StudentFatherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentFatherCntry_ ON StudentFather.Cntry_No = StudentFatherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentFatherreligion ON StudentFather.religion = StudentFatherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentFatherState ON StudentFather.State = StudentFatherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchFatherjob AS StudentFatherjob_ ON StudentFather.job_no = StudentFatherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schGrade AS StudentGrade ON Student.GradeCode = StudentGrade.GradeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS StudentGradeacd ON StudentGrade.acdcode = StudentGradeacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentGradeStage ON StudentGrade.StageCode = StudentGradeStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schMother AS StudentMother ON Student.MotherCode = StudentMother.MotherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentMotherarea ON StudentMother.area = StudentMotherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentMotherCntry_ ON StudentMother.Cntry_No = StudentMotherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentMotherreligion ON StudentMother.religion = StudentMotherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentMotherState ON StudentMother.State = StudentMotherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchMotherjob AS StudentMotherjob_ ON StudentMother.job_no = StudentMotherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentStage ON Student.Stage = StudentStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstatus AS Studentschstatus_ ON Student.schstatus_code = Studentschstatus_.schstatus_code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstclasskinddmg AS Studentschstclasskinddmg ON Student.schstclasskinddmgid = Studentschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstespetialest AS Studentschstspl ON Student.schstsplid = Studentschstspl.schstsplid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schsthealthcase AS Studentschsthlthcase ON Student.schsthlthcaseid = Studentschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schstudentsefa AS Studentstudentsefa ON Student.studentsefa = Studentstudentsefa.studentsefaid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS Studentstudentsefadebitaccount ON Studentstudentsefa.debitaccount = Studentstudentsefadebitaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstudenttyp AS Studentschstudenttyp ON Student.schstudenttypid = Studentschstudenttyp.schstudenttypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schtransferlist AS StudentSchtransfer ON Student.Schtransferid = StudentSchtransfer.Schtransferid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schFather AS Father ON schvchdlydetailreg.FatherCode = Father.FatherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyStatus AS FatherMaritalStatus ON Father.MaritalStatus = FatherMaritalStatus.Status_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS Fatherarea ON Father.area = Fatherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS FatherCntry_ ON Father.Cntry_No = FatherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS Fatherreligion ON Father.religion = Fatherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS FatherState ON Father.State = FatherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchFatherjob AS Fatherjob_ ON Father.job_no = Fatherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schpaymenttype AS schpaymenttype ON schvchdlydetailreg.schpaymenttypeid = schpaymenttype.schpaymenttypeid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS schpaymenttypedebitaccount ON schpaymenttype.debitaccount = schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfbab AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_ ON schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Clsacc_No = schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_.Acc_Bab LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfband AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Bnd ON schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Acc_Bnd = schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Bnd LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS schpaymenttypecreditaccount ON schpaymenttype.creditaccount = schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfbab AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_ ON schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Clsacc_No = schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_.Acc_Bab LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfband AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Bnd ON schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Acc_Bnd = schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Bnd

field.name: acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: acd Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: StudentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: Studentacd Gl Finperiod Fin period info
